citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible individual was not available to accompany the USDA inspector on 7/14/14 at approximately 11: 45
am . Licensee was reached by phone but was out of town and unable to return to the facility.

narrative:
2.126(a)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible individual was not available to accompany the USDA inspector on 7/14/14 at approximately 11: 45
am . Licensee was reached by phone but was out of town and unable to return to the facility.
